Command
-------
000000 00100 00101 00110 00000 100000
op     rs    rt    rd    shamt func

0000 0000 1000 0101 0011 0000 0010 0000
00 85 30 20

Little-Endian
-------------
20 30 85 00


Big-Endian
----------
00 85 30 20

Note: "special" instructions aren't guaranteed to be any specific type.

000000001000010100110 00000 100000

00000000100001010011000000100000
00000000100001010011000000100000
